content.p: As an international employer, the University of Nottingham is dedicated to promoting diversity and equal opportunities for all staff and students. The UK immigration system operates on a points-based framework. Most overseas workers at the University apply through the Global Talent or Sponsored Skilled Worker routes, although other pathways may also be available. The University of Nottingham is licensed to issue Certificates of Sponsorship for Skilled Worker and Government Authorised Exchange (Temporary Work) visas. For information on staff visa support, please contact the HR Staff Immigration Team. For information on student visa support, please contact the Student Immigration Support team.
